name: ReverieConnect
0:
”Alexa, open Reverie Connect and set bed to flat”
”Alexa, open Reverie Connect and move bed to zero gravity”
”Alexa, open Reverie Connect and change my bed to antisnore”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reverie connect
Developer Terms of Use
des: Command your Reverie adjustable power bed to move into 9 different pre-set positions, including zero gravity, anti-snore, flat, set preset position 1, set present position 2, set preset position 3, and move to preset positions 1, 2, and 3.
